announcements.name: [September 19] Mining Changes
announcements.description: Hello!  Over the past couple of days we've been rolling some balance changes and bug fixes for the 0.20.6 update.

announcements.name: Hypixel SkyBlock 0.20.6 - Modernized Mining, Dye Changes, and more!
announcements.description: Hello!  Today we are bringing you Hypixel SkyBlock update 0.20.6, with massive changes to the Mining Skill, some changes to Dyes, and more!

announcements.name: Hypixel SkyBlock 0.20.5 - Artist's Abode
announcements.description:
Hello!
Welcome to Hypixel SkyBlock Patch 0.20.5! As of today, Marco is no longer the Village's only resident artist, with Vincent having moved into the Artist's Abode! Read on to learn what exactly Vincent brings to the game and how he will help you express your decorative side!
